PrecisAuthority (a) to enter into an out-of-court SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT with the SQUAMISH INDIAN BAND, dated May 11, 2000 for reference, in full and final settlement of a number of actions and claims alleging reserve-related wrong-doing on the part of the federal government, and (b) to accept the Instrument of Absolute Surrender set out in Schedule 1 to the Agreement.
